testcase.name: To verify advance payment report without selecting any filter
testcase.system-out: Given for url...............................................................passed When user enter username and password.......................................passed And click sign in to open erp home page.....................................passed Then user click fee manager logo............................................passed When user open advance payment report.......................................passed And select installment with index "1" on advance payment report.............passed Then click show on advance payment report...................................passed
